channel.title: How do i make my server not be so laggy?!i cant even get on
channel.description: soon as i try to logg on my server it laggs....its running and everything....i have a very slow computer idk if that why, its not very very slow but its kinda slow...i logg on and it goes to my menu then it quickly says connection-lost attemting to reestablish........can som1 help???

item.title: How do i make my server not be so laggy?!i cant even get on
item.dc:creator: @J112 J
item.description:
@J112 wrote:

If your computer is terrible, you won’t get much hits. No one wants to play on a laggy server, no matter how good it is.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my server not be so laggy?!i cant even get on
item.dc:creator: @hydromcmac2 hydromcmac2
item.description:
@hydromcmac2 wrote:

darkest_mage:

… my server isnt laggy and i didnt waste my money on a duo

No it doesn’t. -.-’ lmao. Yeah, it’s like a thing to prevent lag. Basically according what you guys are talking about. Your real problem could be that more than one person is trying to logon to your server at a time. If your just trying to log on by yourself on to your server, then your computer really sucks. Sorry. =’(
